text:
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
/ ^ • /
June 29, 1959
Dr* Maurice F* Seay, Director
Division of Education
W9 K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice*
Upon my return frc© out-of-town this (Saturday) afternoon, I find
your welcome letter of June 26, with the W. K. Kellogg Foundation
check in the amount of $42,738*00 as the first payment on the
three year grant generously provided us by the Foundation*
Since I leave Monday morning for a week, I hasten to draft this
acknowledgment with our deep appreciation* This check is being
forwarded on Monday to NAEB Treasurer Robert Coleman for deposit
to the new account being set up for this grant* Reports will be
provided, as specified*
I am asking that a press release be prepared and sent you for your
suggested revisions, within the next ten days* *&?* Hill of this
office will be in touch with you on this, and X shall hope to be
back in the office before it is released*
If you hav? any suggestions regarding its distribution, beyond our
regular educational and trade press channels, and the news services,
w© would be grateful to have them*
Once again, the warmest thanks of the NAEB to the Foundation for
this assistance*
Sincerely,
Harry J«ySkomia
Executive Director
HJS/dp
ec* NAEB Board
NAEB Finance Camaittee
